issue.title: TODO for release notes 0.16.0
issue.body:
Whenever possible, please amend the `doc/release-notes.md` within the pull that introduces a new fancy feature or breaks compatibility.

If this is not possible, please mention the pull here, so it can be taken care of later.

milestone.description: This will be the release of segwit wallet. ðŸŽ‰

events.body: #11178 adds iswitness parameter to decodetransaction and fundrawtransaction

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12001 [RPC] added minRelayTxFee amount to getmempoolinfo / https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11475
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12035 [qt] change ÂµBTC to bits
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11740 Implement BIP159 NODE_NETWORK_LIMITED (pruned peers) *signaling only*
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3716 GUI: Receive: Remove option to reuse a previous address
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11258 [rpc] Add initialblockdownload to getblockchaininfo
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11395 Qt: Enable searching by transaction id
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11389 Support having SegWit always active in regtest (sipa, ajtowns, jnewbery)
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11316 [qt] Add use available balance in send coins dialog 
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11480 [ui] Add toggle for unblinding password fields
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11626 rpc: Make `logging` RPC public
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10871 Handle getinfo in bitcoin-cli w/ -getinfo 
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11167 Full BIP173 (Bech32) support 
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11099 Add savemempool RPC
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11176 enable experimental asm by default
Clamp walletpassphrase timeout to 2^30 seconds and check its bounds #12101

[RPC] Disallow using addresses in createmultisig #11415
Bump wallet version to 159900 and remove the `usehd` option #11250

Known issues/lacking features for segwit wallet support that need to be mentioned:
- `signmessage` doesn't support segwit addresses
- `importmulti`  doesn't support segwit (if #12253 doesn't get addressed before 0.16.0, which is likely)
* Rescans no longer causing a "full lock down"... #11281
Release notes are now up on the wiki, please help contributing: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/0.16.0-Release-notes
Can be closed now? Seems all the points are mentioned somewhere.
